data.NAME:COOPDESC11: Soviet bases in Cuba pose a threat to the Continental United States so they must be eliminated. Commander 1 will take control of our secret Air Force Command near the coast. Commander 2 will secure the city of Havana.
data.NAME:COOPDESC12: Yuri has managed to establish bases in the Hollywood Hills. Commander 1 will take charge of the area around LAX. Commander 2 will take command of the power and oil facilities just east of the freeway.
data.NAME:COOPDESC13: You have successfully driven Yuri and his Russian allies back into the USSR. The time has come to finish them, Commanders. Establish your bases and end this war.
data.NAME:COOPDESC21: The Americans believe they can hold Seattle. Crush thier defensive positions and let us move on to more glorious battles. Commander 1 will take command of our naval forces, while Commander 2 prepares for a crushing armored assault.
data.NAME:COOPDESC22: The traitor Yuri is rebuilding his forces in the Egyptian desert. Commander 1 will take charge of our old base along the Nile. Commander 2 must protect our oil fields just south of Yuri's front lines.
data.NAME:COOPDESC23: It appears the Black Forest of Germany will be the final resting place of both our enemies. Both seek out Einstein's laboratory in vain hope it will give them hope of survival. Intelligence has pin pointed the location of the nuclear reactors that must surely power Einstein's lab. Secure your positions and then seek out and destroy the enemies of the Soviet state once and for all.
data.NAME:COOPDESC31: The Allies have constructed defenses around their precious White House. They hide behind their technology like scared children. Establish your bases and end their poor mindless attempts to hold us back.
data.NAME:COOPDESC32: The Red Army has managed to steal the Allies prism technology and is trying to develop their own version of the Prism Tower at a secret research facility deep in the Yucatan jungle. We will launch a surprise attack on their base and squash the Soviets last hope for victory. Commander 1 will begin north of a small oil field. Commander two will begin just east of a local airport.
data.NAME:COOPDESC33: The Allies and Soviets have allied against us. They have gathered the last of their forces in London. Commander 1 will control our oil derrick in the city and Commander 2 will control the hospital across the Thames. This victory will ensure Yuri's mastery of the world.
data.NAME:COOPDESC41: In the wake of the Soviet invasion, Yuri has established two bases in the heart of New York City. No longer under Yuri's control, the Red Army has allied with the Americans to defeat the traitor.
data.GUI:UnderParMsgAll01md: Your quick thinking caught both the Soviets and Yuri off guard. The Soviet invasion of San Francisco has been thwarted, and Yuri's plans have been thrown into disarray. Well done, Commander.
data.GUI:OverParMsgAll01md: Though we have thwarted both the plans of the Soviets and Yuri, the population of San Francisco suffered terrible losses.
data.LoadMsg:All01md: Operation: Time Lapse - Location: San Francisco, California
BRIEF:ALL01MD: It's only a matter of time before Yuri brings the Psychic Dominator on Alcatraz back online. Our only chance is to use Professor Einstein's Time Machine to send us back in time and stop Yuri before he can complete his worldwide network of Psychic Domnators.
Objective 1: Capture Power Plants to power the Time Machine
Objective 3: Destroy the Psychic Dominator on Alcatraz
LoadBrief:All01md: Objective 1: Capture Power Plants to power the Time Machine
Objective 3: Destroy the Psychic Dominator on Alcatraz

LoadBrief:All02md: Objective 1: Destroy all Grinders in the city
Hint: Not all civilians have been mind controlled. Some of them may even be able to help us in the coming battle
BRIEF:ALL02MD: Yuri has mind controlled the population of Los Angeles and is feeding the civilians into his Grinders to fund his Psychic Dominator project. If we can eliminate the Grinders, Yuri will have lost a significant source of funds.
Objective 1: Destroy all Grinders in the city
Hint: Not all civilians have been mind controlled. Some of them may even be able to help us in the coming battle

data.MISSION:Heroes: Hint: Action Heroes are excellent against infantry. Use them to eliminate Yuri Clones
data.LoadMsg:All03md: Operation: Power Play - Location: Seattle, Washington
BRIEF:ALL03MD: Now that we've destroyed Yuri's primary source of funds, the madman has decided to take a more direct approach. Yuri has set up a Nuclear Silo in Seattle and is using it to extort money and technical expertise from the MassiveSoft corporation. We must save the city and MassiveSoft from Yuri's nuclear threat.
data.MISSION:RescueMS: Secondary Objective: Liberate the MassiveSoft Campus from Yuri's goons
data.MISSION:RescueEinstein: Objective: Rescue Einstein from Yuri's secret base near the Great Pyramid
data.MISSION:DestroyYuri04A: Objective: Destroy Yuri's main base in the East
data.MISSION:DerrickHint: Hint: Send engineers into the oil derricks in the East to increase cash flow
Brief:All04md: Yuri has captured Einstein in an attempt to expedite the completion of his Psychic Dominator Technology. It is imperative we rescue Einstein immediately and then rid Egypt of all Yuri forces.
Objective 1: Destroy Bio Reactors around Great Pyramid to rescue Einstein.
data.GUI:UnderParMsgAll04md: With your speed and accuracy Einstein was rescued and Yuri's installation is no more. Yuri realizes now you're a force to be reckoned with.
data.GUI:OverParMsgAll04md: You rescued Einstein but Yuri was able to withdraw key forces before his base was destroyed.
data.LoadMsg:All05md: Operation: Clones Down Under - Location: Sydney, Australia
data.MISSION:BoomerAttack: WARNING - Yuri is sending Boomer subs our way! Prepare for confrontation!
data.MISSION:DestroyCloning: Objective: Destroy Yuri's Cloning facility in the South
Brief:All05md: Yuri has established cloning facilities in Sydney, Australia. It is believed he plans to clone the world leaders. We must put an end to this operation at any cost.
Objective 1: Find and destroy Yuri's Cloning Vats.
data.GUI:UnderParMsgAll05md: Yuri's cloning facilities are now rubble thanks to your incredible tactics. Well done!
data.GUI:OverParMsgAll05md: You have destroyed Yuri's cloning facilities, but the long battle has left Sydney devastated.
LoadBrief:All07md: Objective 1: Build a Soviet Radar Dish
Objective 2: Destroy the Psychic Dominator in Antarctica
BRIEF:ALL07MD: It's almost over, Commander. Yuri's plot lies in ruins. However, he still has one last Psychic Dominator located somewhere in his stronghold in Antarctica. Bring the abandoned Soviet Base on Tierra del Fuego back online and build a radar dish so that we can pinpoint Yuri's exact location. Then, with the combined might of Allied and Soviet forces, put an end to Yuri's plans once and for all.
Objective 1: Build a Soviet Radar Dish
Objective 2: Destroy the Psychic Dominator in Antarctica
data.MISSION:Fuego: Objective: Use engineers to bring the Soviet base back online

data.MISSION:RecoverRomanov: Objective: Rescue Romanov from Yuri's control
data.MISSION:DestroyYuri04S: Objective: Destroy Yuri's base around the airport so Romanov can be safely evacuated
data.MISSION:TakeRomanov: Objective: Take Romanov to the airport where he can be transported away safely
Brief:Sov04md: Premier Romanov has been shot down by Yuri's forces. We must locate the Premier and take him to the airport so he can be rescued. Yuri has built a tough defense around the airport that we need to eliminate before the Premier's rescue will be secure.
Objective 1: Locate Premier Romanov and protect him.
Objective 2: Destroy Yuri's base guarding the airport.
Objective 3: Take Romanov to the airport once it is safe.
data.GUI:UnderParMsgSov04md: Premier Romanov has been rescued and safely evacuated thanks to your quick and decisive elimination of Yuri's base.
data.GUI:OverParMsgSov04md: Premier Romanov has been rescued and safely evacuated but he is not happy. It took too long for you to rescue him.
data.LoadMsg:Sov06md: Operation: To the Moon - Location: The Moon
data.MISSION:BuildBase: Objective: Find a location to set up base
data.MISSION:DestroyLunarCommand: Objective: Locate and destroy Yuri's Lunar Command Center
data.MISSION:DestroyYuri06S: Objective: Destroy all remaining Yuri buildings
Brief:Sov06md: Yuri plans to launch himself to the moon after initiating his Psychic Dominator wave over earth. We need to install a base on the moon so we can build an attack force capable of destroying Yuri's moon bases and his Lunar Command Center.
Objective 1: Find a location to build a base.
Objective 2: Locate and Destroy Yuri's Lunar Command Center.
data.GUI:UnderParMsgSov06md: You moved so quickly that Yuri couldn't do anything but watch his lunar establishment crumble. The moon is now a part of the glorious Soviet state.
data.GUI:OverParMsgSov06md: Yuri's lunar base has been destroyed. Congratulations, General.
data.GUI:UnderParMsgAll02md: Great job, Commander. Your quick actions minimized civilian losses in the city and denied Yuri an important source of income to fund his plans. Hollywood agents are already offering deals for the rights to your life story.
data.GUI:OverParMsgAll02md: Yuri has lost an important source of funds, but not without exacting a heavy price on the civilian population of Los Angeles.
data.MISSION:NukeHint: HINT: Yuri also relies on Power Plants for his Nuclear Silo
data.MISSION:PowerAtk: WARNING - Our Power Plants are under attack!
data.MISSION:Virus: Hint: Snipers have a longer range than the Virus
data.MISSION:Virus2: Hint: The Virus has a longer range than Snipers
data.MISSION:Cloud: WARNING - Infantry will take damage if standing within a Virus cloud
data.MISSION:LowPower: Capture Power Plants to bring the Weather Control Device online
data.MISSION:Needle: Hint: Garrison the Space Needle to survey the area
data.MISSION:YuriMove: WARNING - Yuri is attempting to engineer our Power Plants
data.GUI:UnderParMsgAll03md: Yuri's plot to blackmail the city of Seattle has been thwarted. Your lightning-fast response prevented heavy losses to the population. Yuri will have to look elsewhere to fund his war effort.
data.GUI:OverParMsgAll03md: Though Yuri has been driven from Seattle, the city paid a heavy price for your victory. Much of Seattle now lies in radioactive ruins, and the software market has been thrown into disarray.
data.LoadMsg:All06md: Operation: Trick or Treaty - Location: London, England
Brief:All06md: Having failed to clone the world leaders, Yuri plans to capture the real ones. Defend them at the Houses of Parliament in London, England...then deal with Yuri.
data.MISSION:ParlHint: Hint: Repair Parliament with an Engineer
data.GUI:UnderParMsgAll06md: Yuri never had a chance. The world leaders are safe and Yuri has been driven from London. Excellent work, General.
data.GUI:OverParMsgAll06md: The day is won...but at what cost? The world leaders feared for their lives during the battle and fled at first chance. The treaty holds...for now.
data.MISSION:MixUnits: Hint: Combine Soviet infantry with our IFV's for more powerful units
data.MISSION:PDHint: Hint: Spread our units out so that the Psychic Dominator won't be able to mind control large masses of our forces.
data.MISSION:GMHint: Hint: Spread out our infantry so that Yuri will not be able to use the Genetic Mutator on large groups of units.
data.GUI:UnderParMsgAll07md: The whole world now knows your true brilliance as a commander. Your image is appearing on stamps in every nation across the globe, and a worldwide holiday has been declared in your honor.
data.GUI:OverParMsgAll07md: The world will never know just how close it came to complete destruction. Let's hope we got every last one of Yuri's clones.
LoadBrief:Sov01md: Objective 1: Destroy the Allied Navy and Grand Cannons.
Objective 2: Destroy Pill Boxes around Time Machine to capture it.
Objective 3: Capture 4 Power Plants to Power Time Machine.
Objective 4: Take Control of Soviet Base and use it to Destroy the Psychic Dominator.
Brief:Sov01md: The world is in ruin. Yuri is poised to rule unchallenged. Only a daring Allied plan to travel back in time stands between Yuri and total domination. But Yuri must pay for his betrayal at Soviet hands, not Allied. We must capture the Time Machine and travel back ourselves.
Objective 1: Destroy the Allied Navy and Grand Cannons.
Objective 2: Destroy Pill Boxes around Time Machine to capture it.
Objective 3: Capture 4 Power Plants to Power Time Machine.
Objective 4: Take Control of Soviet Base and use it to Destroy the Psychic Dominator.
data.MISSION:RexyHelp: Rexy is trapped! Won't you help him?
data.MISSION:RexyFrnd: Rexy is now your friend to the end!
data.MISSION:WarnStct: WARNING - Critical structure. Do not destroy!!!
data.MISSION:MoreTrps: More of our troops have arrived on the beach
data.MISSION:MoreEngn: Engineers have arrived near the Time Machine
data.MISSION:YuriPowr: Yuri is trying to capture the Power Plants!
data.MISSION:HintPowr: Hint: Capture Power Plants with Engineers
data.MISSION:DomArmed: The Psychic Dominator is now armed!!!
data.MISSION:HintDom: Hint: Capturing Power Plants will stop the Psychic Dominator
data.GUI:UnderParMsgSov01md: You have destroyed the Psychic Dominator before Yuri could react. Yuri does not yet realize our plans.
data.GUI:OverParMsgSov01md: The Psychic Dominator has been destroyed...but Yuri is now aware of our plans.
data.LoadMsg:Sov03md: Operation: Brain Wash - Location: London, England
Brief:Sov03md: The Allies have discovered a Psychic Dominator in London, England. Yuri has taken control of the Allied strike force to help defend his near-complete Dominator. Free the Allies and join forces with them to defeat Yuri...but beware, the Dominator could become operational at any moment.
data.MISSION:WarnArmd: WARNING - The Psychic Dominator is Armed!!!
data.GUI:UnderParMsgSov03md: The Psychic Dominator has been destroyed and the Allies believe we fought for a common good. Fools.
data.GUI:OverParMsgSov03md: This Psychic Dominator has been neutralized, but I doubt the Allies will ever help us again.
data.LoadMsg:Sov05md: Operation: Escape Velocity - Location: An uncharted island in the Pacific Ocean
LoadBrief:Sov05md: Objective 1: Pick a landing zone and construct a base.
Objective 2: Locate and destroy Yuri's Submarine Pen.
Objective 3: Finish off all remaining Yuri forces.
data.GUI:UnderParMsgSov05md: Your swift attack will keep this secret island a secret forever. Yuri's forces are in full retreat. Press on, General--Defeat Yuri!
data.GUI:OverParMsgSov05md: Yuri's submarines are no longer a threat, but your lengthy siege has given Yuri ample time to form another devious plan.
LoadBrief:All04md: Objective 1: Destroy Bio Reactors at Great Pyramid to rescue Einstein.
LoadBrief:All05md: Objective 1: Find and destroy Yuri's Cloning Facilities.
data.MISSION:Sov1Obj1: Objective 1: Destroy the Allied Navy and Grand Cannons.
data.MISSION:Sov1Obj2: Objective 2: Destroy Pill Boxes around Time Machine to capture it.
data.MISSION:Sov1Obj3: Objective 3: Capture 4 Power Plants to Power Time Machine.
data.MISSION:Sov1Obj4: Objective 4: Take Control of Soviet Base and use it to Destroy the Psychic Dominator.
data.MISSION:Sov1Obj5: Objective: Defend the Time Machine until it can be reactivated.
data.LoadMsg:Sov02md: Operation: Deja Vu - Location: Black Forest, Germany
LoadBrief:Sov02md: Objective 1: Destroy the outposts guarding the German border.
Objective 2: Destroy Einstein's Laboratory and Chronosphere
Brief:Sov02md: We lost the battle here in the Black Forest the first time around and were eventually defeated by the Allies with the help of Einstein's Chronosphere. This time, we must not fail. Destroy Einstein's Laboratory and Chronosphere to ensure Soviet victory in our war against the Allies.
Objective 1: Destroy the outposts guarding the German border.
Objective 2: Destroy Einstein's Laboratory and Chronosphere.
data.MISSION:Sov2Obj1: Objective 1: Destroy the outposts guarding the German border.
data.MISSION:Sov2Obj2: Objective 2: Destroy Einstein's Lab and Chronosphere.

data.MISSION:ImportDino: Thanks to ChronoSphere technology we were able import dinosaurs to help us defeat Yuri!

data.MISSION:TopSecret: You've discovered something no one has ever seen before!
data.MISSION:BuildUp: Build up your defenses quickly before Yuri's attack forces arrive!

data.MISSION:Lose1: We have lost our foothold in Antarctica
data.MISSION:Lose2: All of our forces have been destroyed
data.MISSION:Lose3: We have lost the ability to build radar
data.GUI:UnderParMsgSov02md: Your ferocious assault on Einstein's Lab and the swift destruction of the Chronosphere have ensured that the Soviet people shall be victorious in the war. The Allies are already retreating on all fronts.
data.GUI:OverParMsgSov02md: Though the Chronosphere was destroyed, Einstein had enough time to flee with his research papers and keep his Chronosphere project alive.
data.MISSION:ReinforcementsSov04md: Reinforcements have arrived and await orders from your base
data.MISSION:PolarBears: It looks like these bears were tired of the cold!
data.MISSION:ReinforcementsSov06md: Reinforcements have arrived and await orders from your base
Brief:Sov07md: Hoping to hide from your onslaught, Yuri has retreated to his ancestral home in Transylvania. We can not allow him any respite or he will only rally his forces and return again to threaten us all. Eliminate Yuri now and forever!
data.GUI:UnderParMsgSov07md: The sheer ferocity of your attack and genius of your tactics left Yuri stunned. There is no doubt you have crushed him once and for all.
data.GUI:OverParMsgSov07md: Though the battle was long, you have finally rid the world of Yuri.
